nodes.text: The Indra-su-Mar sector was located in the Slice portion of the Expansion Region. It contained the Farfalla system. By 0 ABY, the Indra-su-Mar sector bordered the Authala sector spinward, the Ombakond sector Coreward, and the Dimean sector in the trailing direction. The northwestern portion of the sector was also adjacent to the Null Zone and the Nuon e Safyd sector, and together with the Authala and Dimean sectors, it formed the Expansion Region's Rimward border, neighboring the Maerdocian sector of the Mid Rim.

The Indra-su-Mar sector was introduced in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry. In 2012, the sector was illustrated on a map designed by Modi and published in the Online Companion feature "Essential Atlas Extra: Expansion Region."
